questions.question: Hello! How can I help you today?
questions.intent: User should respond with a greeting and indicate they need help or have a question
expectedElements: Polite greeting (hello, hi, good morning, etc.)
Indication of needing help or having a question
May mention general topic like account, billing, technical issue
questions.context: Customer service greeting - checking if user can respond appropriately to open-ended help offer
questions.sampleResponse: Hello, I need help with my account

questions.question: Can you please provide your account number?
questions.intent: User should provide a specific account number or identifier
expectedElements: Clear indication this is their account reference
questions.context: Account identification - user should provide specific account details

questions.question: What seems to be the issue with your account?
questions.intent: User should describe a specific problem or issue they're experiencing
expectedElements: Clear description of a problem or issue
Relates to account access, functionality, or services
Specific enough to understand the nature of the problem
questions.context: Problem identification - user should articulate their specific issue clearly
questions.sampleResponse: I can't log into my account
